definitions.definition: The large fruit of the Citrus maxima (syn. C. grandis ), native to South Asia and Southeast Asia , with a thick green or yellow rind , a thick white pith , and semi-sweet translucent pale flesh .
The tree which produces this fruit .

main_definition: The large fruit of the Citrus maxima (syn. C. grandis ), native to South Asia and Southeast Asia , with a thick green or yellow rind , a thick white pith , and semi-sweet translucent pale flesh .
secondary_definitions: The tree which produces this fruit .
